page.title: 04MENDIP PLATEAU-RECREATION
page.content: Although the dominant land use is agriculture, a number of other activities are found in this block. It is a popular area for recreation. The block is within an Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty. There are many footpaths including the West Mendip Way, which allow walkers to enjoy the distinctive scenery of the area.Conservation is important. Black Rock,Longwood & Velvet Bottom are all nature reserves.Their Nature trails are often used by school parties for educational purposes.The area is important for caving,catering for both novices and more experienced cavers.Riding is also popular.
